title: Romney cracks 50
author: VD
content_html:
Thus spake Gallup:  Romney 50%, Obama 46% Among Likely Voters.  Obama down sharply among men, college grads, and Southern voters vs. 2008

If Romney manages a similar rout again tonight, we could end up seeing a landslide in a few weeks.
content_text:
Thus spake
Gallup
:
Romney 50%, Obama 46% Among Likely Voters.  Obama down sharply among men, college grads, and Southern voters vs. 2008
If Romney manages a similar rout again tonight, we could end up seeing a landslide in a few weeks.
